preferences.description: Temperature is a value between 0 and 1 that controls randomness in the AI's response. Higher values will produce more diverse and creative responses, while lower values will result in more focused and deterministic completions.
preferences.name: temperature
preferences.title: Temperature

preferences.description: Max tokens is the maximum number of tokens that the AI will return. This allows you to control the length of the text completion.
preferences.name: maxTokens
preferences.title: Max Tokens

preferences.description: Top P is a value between 0 and 1. A higher value will consider a larger set of tokens, leading to more diverse responses, while a lower value will focus on the most likely tokens.
preferences.name: topP
preferences.title: Top P

preferences.description: Frequency Penalty is a value between 0 and 1. A higher penalty will discourage repetitive phrases, whereas a lower penalty may allow for more repetition.
preferences.name: frequencyPenalty
preferences.title: Frequency Penalty

preferences.description: Presence Penalty is a value between 0 and 1. A higher penalty will discourage the use of prompt content, while a lower penalty may allow for more similar content.
preferences.name: presencePenalty
preferences.title: Presence Penalty
